name: Planet Probe (itch)
description:
The story of the last survivors and their struggle to rebuild the post-apocalyptic Earth.

The uncontrolled exploitation of Earth`s resources has taken its toll. The last survivors leave the dying planet and find refuge on space stations in Earth orbit. They are desperately trying to find a way to rebuild the Earth. The sudden discovery of the Planet probe offers a new chance to change the fate of the Earth.

Submission to Gdevelop Game Jam #1

Theme Build and or Rebuild

Control probe with arrows

Avoid asteroids

Keep probe aligned with planet.Inside preimeter of H.U.D. If the probe is not aligned with the planet for more than 5 seconds, it deviates from the course and all contact is lost.

If something is unclear see help section in game.

Game is tested in multiple browsers on Windows and Linux. In Brave browser text is not displayed correctly so it is advisable to start the game in Chrome or Firefox.

All images from wallpaper sites getwallpapers.org  nawpic.com  wallpaperaccess.com  wallpaperscraft.com

Music: Magmi soundtracks  Kris Klavenes

Planets art Viktor Hahn

Additional graphic Pikpng  Cleanpng
